summary: "My Way" is a famous song made popular by Frank Sinatra in 1969. The music was originally composed by Jacques Revaux for a French song, "Comme d'habitude," with lyrics by Gilles Thibaut and Claude Fran√ßois. Paul Anka wrote the English lyrics, which were adapted from the French version. Many artists, like Elvis Presley and Sid Vicious, have performed this song. Sinatra's version was a huge hit, staying in the UK Top 40 for 75 weeks, one of the longest runs in British chart history.
title: My Way
